title: Mean Reversion Bands + Oscillator
purpose: Find fades from Bollinger bands with oscillator confirmation.
rationale: Fade extremes at Bollinger bands when RSI is oversold/overbought and Stoch RSI turns.

reading_guide.signal_logic: (close <= bb_lower_20 AND rsi<30 AND stoch_rsi up) OR (close >= bb_upper_20 AND rsi>70 AND stoch_rsi down)

assistant_hints: Fade extremes at bands; avoid strong trends.
Wait for Stoch RSI turn, not just RSI extreme.
Take profits near mid-band to reduce whipsaw.
Use hourly to reduce noise for beginners.
beginner_summary: Find fades from Bollinger bands with oscillator confirmation.
